Body: Who we are About the Department Staff Research groups Students How we are organised Research and Graduate Division - Including, for IT  professionals: PEVE Unit and Manchester Informatics Undergraduate School What we do Postgraduate Courses Undergraduate Courses in Computer Science The Erasmus Exchange Programme Outline of our Major Research Themes Forthcoming events Our technical report series , including many links to full papers 50 years of stored program computing - find out more about our plans to celebrate the birth of modern computing here at Manchester.
